column4: How do I install programs? I'm a total linux newb...I've downloaded Opera web browser, and unzipped it to control.tar.gz and data.tar.gz and debian-binary. Then I unpacked the .gz-files, but dont know what to do with the files?

How do I install programs? I'm a total linux newb...I've downloaded Opera web browser, and unzipped it to control.tar.gz and data.tar.gz and debian-binary. Then I unpacked the .gz-files, but dont know what to do with the files?
we use apt-get and dpkg here. no need to unzip anything.
